data.code_commit_message:
feat(ANEM): Phase 8: WB→ID timing hazard fixes — write-through bypass and JR stall

Fix 3 WB→ID timing hazards where register bank reads at ID stage got stale
values when WB wrote the same register at the same rising_edge (distance 3
in pipeline). Add register bank write-through bypass for A_OUT/B_OUT,
HI/LO bypass muxes with byte-merge for partial M1 writes, and JR stall
detection in hazunit. Add trace comparison infrastructure (tb_trace, Makefile
compare targets, TRACE_FORMAT spec). All 32 assertion tests + 9 simulator
trace comparisons pass.
